Summary: was smoking and seen a craft
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Beaverton
There were no other sightings in Beaverton on or around July 26th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailswas woken up by cat and went out to smoke as i went outside i noticed how clear the sky was as i was looking i noticed a shooting star (or i thought it was) within 3 seconds i noticed an object extremely far away traveling very quickly from south to north as i watched it i noticed it had a half circle of red lights blinking from right to left and a bright red light on the point on the rear . as i watched the object i knew it was to fast and to high to be an airplane,as it passed over where i was standing the red lights in front turned yellow and the tail light was off . i ran to the front of the house to view it as it traveled and it went straight up and dissapeared. I am very confused about what i saw. i realize that it would be arrogant for us to think we are alone in the universe but never really 100% that we were being visited by other life forms
